org.apache.beam.sdk.options

Interface StreamingOptions

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApplicationNameOptions, GcpOptions, GoogleApiDebugOptions, HasDisplayData, PipelineOptions
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    BigQueryOptions, BlockingDataflowPipelineOptions, DataflowPipelineOptions, DataflowWorkerHarnessOptions, FlinkPipelineOptions, PubsubOptions, SparkPipelineOptions, SparkStreamingPipelineOptions, TestDataflowPipelineOptions

    public interface StreamingOptions
extends ApplicationNameOptions, GcpOptions, PipelineOptions
    Options used to configure streaming.
